snippet.title: Pump It Up: 1st Dance Floor | Black Cat | Hard (VS)
snippet.description:
In the first few PIU games, Versus Mode by default worked similarly to DDR's Couple Mode where 1P and 2P has slightly different charts. You needed to apply a special mod (i.e. Synchro) if you wanted both players to have the same chart.

These special "versus" charts would be available for most songs from 1st through O.B.G. and Extra up until PREX 1.

---

Feel free to support me on Ko-fi! A cup of coffee always gets me going after all!
➤ Ko-fi: https://ko-fi.com/vkimroyal

Pump It Up: 1st Dance Floor
Copyrights © 1998, 1999 by Andamiro/Sundoo Co., LTD.

• Song: Black Cat
• Artist: Turbo
• BPM: 143

• First Appearance: 1st Dance Floor
• Removed: 2nd Dance Floor, Extra, PREX 2
• Revived: The Collection, Premiere

• Difficulties & Rating | Step Artist:
➤ Hard / Single Lv. 5 | Andamiro

• Additional Notes:
➤ The BPM listed on the titlecard is wrong.
➤ This song was remixed by BanYa for the game.
